name: Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Portable
name_original: Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Portable
description:
Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Portable is an action game. It came out on 06-07-2011.
Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Portable is available on PSP.
It was scored by Hayato Matsuo.
